eventDecorators.name: LogInit
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: LogOnReward
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: LogPoolAddition
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: LogRewardPerSecond
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: LogSetPool
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: LogUpdatePool
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

functionDecorators.name: add
functionDecorators.description: Add a new LP to the pool. Can only be called by the owner. DO NOT add the same LP token more than once. Rewards will be messed up if you do.

functionDecorators.name: massUpdatePools
functionDecorators.description: Update reward variables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!.

parameterDecorators.name: pids
parameterDecorators.description: Pool IDs of all to be updated. Make sure to update all active pools.

functionDecorators.name: pendingToken
functionDecorators.description: View function to see pending Token.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returnDecorators.name: pending
returnDecorators.description: SYMM reward for a given user.

functionDecorators.name: poolLength
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of chef pools.

functionDecorators.name: reclaimTokens
functionDecorators.description: Allows owner to reclaim/withdraw any tokens (including reward tokens) held by this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: Token to reclaim, use 0x00 for Ethereum.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: Receiver of the tokens, first of his name, rightful heir to the lost tokens, reightful owner of the extra tokens, and ether, protector of mistaken transfers, mother of token reclaimers, the Khaleesi of the Great Token Sea, the Unburnt, the Breaker of blockchains.

functionDecorators.name: set
functionDecorators.description: Update the given pool's SYMM allocation point and `IRewarder` contract. Can only be called by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

functionDecorators.name: setRewardPerSecond
functionDecorators.description: Sets the symm per second to be distributed. Can only be called by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardPerSecond
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of Symm to be distributed per second.

functionDecorators.name: updatePool
functionDecorators.description: Update reward variables of the given pool.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returnDecorators.name: pool
returnDecorators.description: Returns the pool that was updated.

functionDecorators.name: userInfo
functionDecorators.description: Info of each user that stakes LP tokens.
